edu.rit.slides.items
Class Size

java.lang.Object
  edu.rit.slides.items.Size
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable
public class Size
extends Object
implements Externalizable

Class Size provides a size (width,height) for a SlideItem.

See Also:
Serialized Form
